content: Economy of SingaporeThis article **provides insufficient context for those unfamiliar with the subject**. Please help improve the article by providing more context for the reader. *(December 2016)* *(Learn how and when to remove this message)* This article contains economic statistics of the country Singapore. The GDP, GDP Per Capita, GNI Per Capita, Total Trade, Total Imports, Total Exports, Foreign Reserves, Current Account Balance, Average Exchange Rate, Operating Revenue and Total Expenditure are mentioned in the table below for years 1965 through 2018. ## 1965 to 2014 Economy Statistics Since Year 1965 To Year 2014Source:YearGDP(Billion)GDP Per CapitaGNI(Billion)GNI Per CapitaTotal Trade
